article.title: Newsletter - Pittsburgh U.S. Export Assistance Council
article.summary: Read issues of Export News, the monthly newsletter from the Pittsburgh U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​Welcome to Export News: the monthlye-newsletter of the U.S. Commercial Service's Pittsburgh office! Please click below for current and past issues discussing hot topics in exporting, resources, and upcoming events.

​We want to hear from you!

​Have a question or want more information on an export topic or have a suggestion on how we can make the newsletter a better tool for you? Please let us know.

Questions should be addressed toOffice.Pittsburgh@trade.gov.


Current Issue:June 2014


Past Issues:​

May 2014

April 2014

March 2014

February 2014

January 2014

December 2013
